hazma.decay_helper_functions package¶

Submodules¶

hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_charged_kaon module¶

class hazma.decay_helper_functions.decay_charged_kaon.ChargedKaon¶

Bases: object

Class for computing the photon spectrum from radiative kaon decay.

Description:

The charged kaon has many decay modes:

k -> mu + nu k -> pi + pi0 k -> pi + pi + pi k -> pi0 + e + nu k -> pi0 + mu + nu k -> pi + pi0 + pi0

For the the two-body final states, the sum of the decay spectra are computed given the known energies of the final state particles in the kaon’s rest frame. The spectrum is then boosted into the lab frame.

For the three-body final state, the energies of the final state particles are computed using RAMBO. The spectra for each final state particle is computed are each point in phases space in the charged kaon’s rest frame and then spectra are summed over. The spectra is then boosted into the lab frame.

Spectrum()¶

Returns the radiative spectrum dNde from charged kaon for a list of gamma ray energies.

Keyword arguments::
eng_gams: List of energies of photon in laboratory frame. eng_k: Energy of charged kaon in laboratory frame.
SpectrumPoint()¶

Returns the radiative spectrum value from charged kaon at a single gamma ray energy.

Keyword arguments::
eng_gam: Energy of photon is laboratory frame. eng_k: Energy of charged kaon in laboratory frame.
